posts.post_content:
Hey everyone, looking to trade these for SLers I need in a Psa 3-4.  Can do moneys either way, just let me know what you have!

Needs in PSA 3-4:
Bernhard, Coles, [STRIKE]Cranston[/STRIKE], Ellam, Foster, Fritz, Greminger, Guiheen, HartBill, Helm, Hickman, Howard, Jordan, Lentz, Lipe, [STRIKE]Manion[/STRIKE], McCauley, Mullaney, Otey, Perdue, Revelle, Rockenfeld, Ryan, [STRIKE]Seitz[/STRIKE], [STRIKE]SidSmith[/STRIKE], Thornton

To be clear, I have all of these listed above in various grades (PSA and SGC) or raw, but I’m trying to upgrade them or swap out to meet what I’m looking for. If you have any of the above in PSA 3-4, I can also possibly add in my dupe in the deal.

Thanks for looking!

TRADED: SEITZ, MOLESWORTH

Made a few trades. Thank you!  

Still have some available. Anyone wanting to trade?
